prompt.purpose: Draft a concise one-page pitch deck outline.
prompt.context: The deck should highlight key points visually and keep wording short.
prompt.instructions:
<!-- markdownlint-disable MD029 -->

1. Provide eight slide titles with bullet content (≤ 12 words each).
1. Suggest a visual cue (icon or chart) for the two most critical slides.
1. Note the single success metric to emphasize.
1. Cap total output at 120 words.
prompt.output_format: Numbered list of slides followed by a visual cue recommendation and success metric.
prompt.additional_notes: Prioritize clarity and brevity for fast pitching.
